import { useEffect, useRef } from "react"; import Header from "../components/Header"; import NavigationBar from "../components/NavigationBar"; import "../styles/general.css" import "../styles/profile.css" export default function Profile() { const user = useRef("") const folderImage = useRef(""); useEffect(() => { const info = JSON.parse(sessionStorage.getItem("userAuth")) user.current = info.user console.log(user.current.avatar) folderImage.current = `${process.env.REACT_APP_SEVER_IP}:${process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_PORT}/uploads/` }, []) return (
